channel.title: 归档 on BloxTop
channel.description: Recent content in 归档 on BloxTop

item.title: 开心一刻
item.description: 某大佬说：“这次牛市，只要你想下车撒泡尿，你就会被牛市的车轮无情抛下，因为这是一趟高铁。”于是我没下车，尿在了裤子上，刚开始有些暖意，可是现在有些凉！

item.title: BCH long opportunity
item.description: BCH long opportunity Another 20% dip took place since 2020-02-24(There is a 30% dip since 2020-02-14).

item.title: Altcoin_algo
item.description: Altcoin algo Algo made a congestion for more than 3 days and shows positive sign.

item.title: BCH bounce
item.description: BCH bounce There is a 30% dip since 2020-2-14 and short-term bottom pattern may form soon.

item.title: Halving year
item.description: Halving year Halving is a process of reducing the rate sending to miners when cryptocurrency is generated.

item.title: Lessons learned
item.description: Day trading and lessons learned order to increase fund utilization, today I tried day trading and felt sucks for my operation.

item.title: BTC short trade
item.description: BTC short trade BTC shows weak today and reaches the resistance 10350. I’m not saying the bullish is over, but at leat a short-term pullback may appear.
